source_sql:
SELECT td.source_record_pk AS unit_id, td.source_url, COALESCE(pi.title, 'Iniciativa sin titulo') AS title, td.text_excerpt AS excerpt
FROM text_documents td
LEFT JOIN parl_initiative_documents pid ON pid.source_record_pk = td.source_record_pk
LEFT JOIN parl_initiatives pi ON pi.initiative_id = pid.initiative_id
WHERE td.source_id='parl_initiative_docs' AND td.text_excerpt IS NOT NULL AND trim(td.text_excerpt) <> ''
ORDER BY td.source_record_pk DESC LIMIT 120;
notes: Concern-tagging batch derived from lane_c adjudicated excerpts.
